title: Ponte Nova (Rua da)
body:
The current street of this name connects the left bank of the Santa Luzia stream with Calçada da Incarnação, but the old one extended to Rua dos Ferreiros, thus encompassing a part of the current Rua dos Netos. This part of the street was opened in 1833.

The works of the so-called Ponte Nova, over the Ribeira de Santa Luzia, were awarded for 890$00 réis, in a council session on May 25, 1768.

1833: Opening of the part of the street
1768: Awarding of the works of Ponte Nova
